ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Digest Number 559
ygData.msgSnippet: If you do do the server change..  come to Vazaelle...  it s not as populated as the other servers,  but there are some cool guilds (like Claws of Night )
ygData.messageBody:
If you do do the server change..  come to Vazaelle...  it's not as populated as the other servers,  but there are some cool guilds (like Claws of Night <GRIN>)  AND you would have my SUPER shaman buffs =D (and free rezzes from my cleric (only 10% now,  but getting higher) 

Kat & Gwen

 "Steven R. Hulse" wrote:

Woot! Well I don't know about you but the sex thing is definitely more
important than EQ! ;) Watching animated characters bump into each other
just doesn't do it for me. :)

That's a good way to put it, I may think about trying that angle, (not
the sex but the closer together part!), I know she would really enjoy
playing once she got started.

I usually play on Solsek Ro but I might do the server change option.
There is another player that won't leave me alone even after I've asked
him several times and petitioned. I don't play EQ to "hook up" I play to
have fun and do my little quests.

-----Original Message-----
Message: 2
   Date: Sat, 10 Aug 2002 16:51:23 -0700 (PDT)
   From: Toni <silly_girl4ever@...>
Subject: Re: Top Everquest Cities?


DENVER ROCKS =D  (gee,  can you tell I am from Denver??)  What server do
you play on?? I am on Vazaelle  Look up either Katashaka (45 Shaman) or
Gwenevieve (20 cleric) both are in The Claws of Night guild =D   It
would be cool if you can get your wife to play....  That's what my BF
did with me...  brought us closer together,  & is also the best birth
control ever invented (who needs sex when you have everquest??)
Kat
